DOC.detailed_description: Thirty-five opioid dependent ( OD ) volunteer seek treatment enrol open-label , flexible-dosing , outpatient trial Duke Addictions Program . On day 1-3 , participant receive buprenorphine/naloxone daily start dose 4mg , progressively decrease 2 mg day 2- 3 . Participants also receive low dose naltrexone ( VLNTX ) dose 0.25 mg 1mg Days 1-3 , 2 6 mg Day 4 10 50 mg Days 5-7 . Then VIVITROL injection , 380 mg , administer Day 8 . Evaluations occur daily 6 hour 1 day VIVITROL injection weekly 4 week . Patients receive ancillary medication need weekly psychosocial intervention . At end study , participant offer outpatient treatment OD study site , refer treatment program .
